english.segment1: I'm here to meet with you. come and meet with me. I'm here to find you. reveal yourself to me
english.segment2: As I wait, you make me strong. As I long, draw me to your arms. As I stand and sing your praise. You come, you come and you fill this place. Won't you come, Won't you come and fill this place
english.segment3: I'm here to meet with you. Come and meet with me. I'm here to find you, reveal yourself to me
english.segment4: As I wait, you make me strong. As I long, draw me to your arms. As I stand and sing your praise. You come, you come and you fill this place. Won't you come, Won't you come and fill this place
english.segment5: I'm here to meet with you. Come and meet with me
